basics.name: Janel Joson
basics.label: Full Stack Software Engineer | UH Mānoa CS Alumni | Passionate about Web Development & User Experience
basics.summary: Studied Computer Science at the University of Hawaiʻi at Mānoa and graduated in Spring 2025, with hands-on experience building responsive web applications and working in Agile teams. I enjoy designing efficient, user-centered software and am excited to contribute to meaningful projects.

work.summary: Contributed to Zippy’s website redevelopment through Piʻikū Co., a workforce development non-profit, building production-level features for a popular Hawaiʻi restaurant chain.
highlights: Developed dynamic front-end components using ReactJS and Java.
Integrated RESTful APIs for real-time restaurant menus, orders, and customer data.
Tested and debugged API responses for seamless front-end/back-end interaction.
Modified configuration files to automate email notifications with Twilio.
Collaborated in Agile sprints with engineers, designers, and product managers.
Utilized Azure DevOps pipelines to deploy and review code.

work.position: Senior IT Student Assistant, Help Desk Consultant
work.summary: Provided technical support to students and staff at UH Mānoa, resolving hardware, software, and network issues.
highlights: Troubleshot and documented solutions for technical issues via phone and email.
Escalated complex problems to appropriate teams ensuring excellent service.

work.company: Office of Multicultural Student Services, UH Mānoa
work.summary: Supported the Hawaiʻi Undergraduate Initiative (HUI), a summer leadership and transition program for incoming UH freshmen.
highlights: Maintained and updated the HUI website ensuring accessibility and fresh content.
Created recruitment materials to increase program awareness and registration.
Organized peer mentor training and promoted events to engage first-year students.

awards.title: Provost Achievement Scholarship
awards.summary: Awarded by the Office of Admissions to high-achieving Hawaiʻi high school graduates.
